string.name: name
string.value: Gathering Information Completed
You have gathered all the information from the informants. Let's give #bJM#k an update about the progress.

As soon as you tell JM the information you have gathered, JM turns pale. Is he surprised at the evil scheme...? JM, with an anxious look on his face, tells you to speak with #b#p9020000##k and ask about #o6220000#.
When asked about #o6220000#, #p9020000# is taken aback by the question and comes clean about the incident... about her accidentally dropping the Growth Powder in the sewer...

Give me an update after you gather all the information from the informants. In order to get to the bottom of this evil scheme, we must gather as much information as possible. Which is the information #p9000008# collected?
#L0##bHe says Dyle looks exactly like the Ligator.#l

#L1#I think he said Dyle somewhat resembles Croco. 
#l
#L2#He's not a foreigner, is he?#l#k

And what did #p1052102# say? 
#L0##bIf we have environmental concerns about Kerning City, she says we must clean out the sewer.#l

#L1#And she says Chris stinks.
#l
#L2#A stench as if something has been mixed into the sewer.#l#k

Tell me what #p1052103# has told you. 
#L0##bShe's told me that Lakelis seems to be a prima donna.#l

#L1#She says Lakelis has been acting strange, so we should pay close attention to her.
#l
#L2#And she thinks Icarus seems so pale because he doesn't exercise enough.#l#k

Did you talk to #p1052006# as well? 
#L0##bI've heard something about some powder that makes you grow.#l

#L1#And, supposedly, there's a monster called Shade that frightens people in the subway.
#l
#L2#He wants to leave the subway.#l#k
......Is that all? That lady couldn't... Right. We should confirm. It's probably not but just in case... go to #p9020000# and ask about #o6220000#.
Why is it that the information you've gathered seem so ambiguous? What good is information that isn't factual?
What difference does it make whether Mr. Pickall is a foreigner or not?! Is that all you have?
Hmm... We should think about the environment so I'll take that into consideration... NOT! Our priority lies on discovering the truth behind the evil scheme... not restoring the environment!
That foolish boy, Chris... I told him to shower frequently. Shumi is way out of his league.
In truth, it is weird how he wears such strange clothes in Kerning City. If it were Orbis... maybe. Anyway, is that part of the information you gathered? HUH?!
Of course he doesn't exercise enough. He sits around all day! That's an obvious speculation. Not the kind of information you should waste my time on!
Shade...? Everyone knows about Shade already. What does Shade have anything to do with it? What have you bee doing all this time?
I sort of understand though. He must be sick of it... poor kid... I feel so sorry for him... NOT! This piece of information serves no purpose!
...No way. She can't be foolish enough to do something like that... not once, but twice...? No... sigh...
You don't know who #p9020000# is? That lady in front of the sewer, gathering adventurers in strange clothes!
...Wha... what is it? Is there something you want from me? Huh? J... JM sent you here? Wha... Why would he... sen.... sen... send you here...? WHAT?! Do I know anything about #o6220000#?!
Haha... seems like you did your research before you came. Yes, you're right. I made a mistake again. I accidentally dropped an unfinished Growth Powder into the sewer! Ahhhhhgh, I'm so sorry!

It wasn't quite finished, so I didn't think it would work... Who knew it would turn #o3110100# into a giant monster. I'm... sorry... I was going to gather adventurers who were willing to hunt #o6220000#! Please ask JM to forgive me...

You haven't gone to #b#p9020000##k yet? Don't tell me you don't know who #p9020000# is! All you have to do is find a lady wearing strange outfit that seems out of place for #m103000000# and heavy, heavy makeup!
